Prints the error message with detailed information.

Parameters:
[out] context - the library context
[in] function - the function where the error occurred
[in] file - the source file where the error occurred
[in] line - the line in the file where the error occurred
[in] code - the error returned by the last function called
[in] reason - the reason that caused the error
[in] ... - the arguments matching reason as format string
